title: Instant Messaging Simulation Learning for Healthcare Professionals' Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Scenario-based problem-solving learning environment using real-time online collaboration tools

learning_goals: Learners can apply patient management protocols with 80% accuracy by analyzing real clinical scenarios
Learners can derive core clinical decisions within 10 minutes through team-based communication
Learners can present at least two improvement cases in professionalism (self-reflection, ethical judgment) by incorporating simulation feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
